metadata.title: CVE-2019-13486 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In Xymon through 4.3.28, a stack-based buffer overflow exists in thestatus-log viewer component because of   expansion in svcstatus.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13486` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xymon - 4.3.29-1
xymon-client - 4.3.29-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xymon package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.3.29-1').
